blogs.title: Intro to react
blogs.body: During my internship at Pamital, I collaborated closely with the design team to implement dynamic UI components using ReactJs and Tailwind CSS, contributing significantly to improved user experiences. This experience, coupled with my proficiency in JavaScript, ReactJs, NextJS, and Typescript, has equipped me with a valuable skill set that I am eager to apply in a software testing role.
blogs.author: Lesley
